name: Kraken's Delight
description:
THE ENDGAME SCREEN DOES NOT TRIGGER :(
If you pulled all 4 nails, consider the game beaten and go to this link.
Or download the EndScreenFix version, which was uploaded an hour after the deadline.

This game was created for Winter #ue4jam 2019. The theme was "All's fair in love and war".

You are a lonely Kraken. One day you notice a beautiful Basilisk chained on a mountain. You fall in love and hurry to save them!! 

  • Move with WASD
  • Use tentacles with LMB
  • Speed up with RMB
  • Use tentacles (Hold LMB) to pull giant nails out! There's no in-game prompt for that.
  • If all your tentacles are up in the air and you can't lower them, just click RMB to drop everything.

Team:

Dito Seregin
Alina Israfilova
Vasily Ovsyankin
Music by Alfie https://soundcloud.com/letterboxedmusic

  • Menu template
